ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3" Sony Color CCD; Signal System: NTSC;  IR Wavelength: 850nm; IR Lamps: 36 LEDs; IR Distance: 60ft
480 TV Lines; Effective Pixels 768(H) x 494(V); Minimum Illumination: 0LUX (IR Lamp on) / F1.8
Electronic Shutter: 1/60 - 1/100,000 sec; S/N Ratio: >48dB; Video Output: 1.0Vp-p/ 75ohms, Negative
Supply Voltage: DC 12V; Power Consumption: Min Req: 600mA / Recommended: 1A
Lens: 3.6mm fixed lens; Gamma Corrections: 0.45; Housing: Aluminum Alloy
ProductInfo.Name: Atrix Night Vision Weatherproof Bullet Sony CCD Camera IR Indoor/Outdoor Security Surveillance CCTV Beige
